snippet: The company announced a new suite of advertising products intended to insert more ads into Facebook’s traditionally clean interface.
abstract: Facebook announces a new suite of advertising products intended to insert more ads into its traditionally clean interface and to take better advantage of mobile ads, where the company has struggled.
lead_paragraph: The company announced a new suite of advertising products intended to insert more ads into Facebook’s traditionally clean interface.

headline.seo: Facebook Paves Way for Huge Growth in Advertising
headline.main: Substantial Growth in Ads Is on the Way to Facebook
headline.print_headline: Substantial Growth in Ads Is On the Way to Facebook
